short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Slope City is an endless sloping game in the ball game genre. You have to control a slope ball.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Slope City is an endless sloping game in the ball game genre. You have to control a slope ball. The ball moves, and you have to have excellent reflexes to control it.

Slope City has the game ball at maximum speed down dizzyingly fast slopes in the city. If you are careful not to hit the obstacles while rolling the ball around the city, you will eventually be the one who can reach the furthest.

How far can you go without hitting obstacles? There are many types of obstacles in the Slope City Game. These obstacles sometimes block your way. You have to pass to the right or left. Sometimes you have to jump over obstacles. Sometimes you have to go through obstacles. Rolling the ball will be fun while dodging and navigating through the sloping city, but you'll have to watch out for the obstacles because the furthest wins.

There are 9 different balls in total. You have to watch the city as it falls from the sloping platforms.

Slope City is a slope unblocked game and a slope driving game. You can also play the Slope City game on Google sites, but don't forget to add the game to your favorites.

This ski slope game can be played on mobile devices.

Features
Collectible crystals that can be used to buy power-ups and unlock new ball models.
compatible with mobile devices.
Fun and fast-paced gameplay with funky music
Endless: go as far as you possibly can!
Unblocked game Slope City
new city concept.
How to play Slope City?
 

To steer left or right, press A/D or the left/right arrow.
